body:
Hi, 

Is it possible to get a dimension line on how far do sun-rays bounce from a surface into an interior space? 



Please take a look at the image attached.



Thank you!

replies.body: Use Discontinuity and item selector components to find the points from the rays [it will be 3 points]. Then find the distance between those points to point A. Sort the distances, the longest distance is the last item in the list.

Thank you I was able to display the points. However, I lose the last point I looked for under (Honeybee_Item_Selector) when I change the date/time/month under SunPath and the rays move. Is there a way were I can set the item selector component to automatically select the last point the rays form whenever the rays move?
You can look for item -1. [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/NxE20jujyI-oeyi32YDmpfnmuMwCjZ5QG1SznDVJtyeinZ4oBpMqdw-5XqhhXnpeI9pCKv6yTI1rDPraej7WK512-9btcWCz/last_items.png)
